p: In contrast to M. lycopodioides, M. kandtiana, and L. calostachys, studies on A. coriaria (DoP structure_elucidation = 2 (2)) , P. hadiensis (DoP structure_elucidation = 6 (3)), and S. aculeastrum (DoP structure_elucidation = 6 (2)) already resulted in isolation of secondary metabolites and structure elucidation [ 83– 96].
